content: I cannot say for certain whether flaws has lashed out against their critics or not, as i do not have access to their personal experiences or emotions. however, it is not uncommon for artists to feel emotional or defensive when receiving negative feedback, particularly if they feel strongly about their work. it's important to remember that everyone reacts differently to criticism, and it's not necessarily a sign of weakness or unprofessionalism if someone reacts emotionally. however, it's important to try and maintain composure and professionalism when responding to criticism, as lashing out can damage relationships and hurt one's reputation. it can be helpful to take some time to process the feedback and respond in a calm and constructive manner.
